headline: NEXX SYSTEMS ECR PECVD RIE SYSTEM
description:
Low Temperature CVD Using ECR Technology.  Formerly PlasmaQuest Astex    This system is designed for the fluorination of DLC surfaces on various substrates. The ECR zone is produced by a Nd-Fe-B permanent magnet which produces a high magnetic field launch of the microwave energy. High magnetic field launch produces a highly stable and efficient ECR plasma. 

Nexx Systems Cirrus 300
keywords: pecvd plasma enhanced chemical vapor deposition  deposition
